_header: Steeds there stumbled in that stound
Note:
Cf. Emmerig (1906)
XEmmerig, Oskar. “The Bataile of Agyncourt.” Lichte geschichtlicher Quellenwerke, I. Nurnberg: Wieser, 1906.
_description: On the Battle of Agincourt — eight 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BLCottCleoCIV.First Lines:
Stedes þat stumbelyd in þat stownde þat stod stere
                    stuffed vnder steleWith gronyng grete thei felle to
                    grownde…
BLCottCleoCIV.Last Lines:
…Ȝit schall þou neuer wayt Inglond goodI swer by god
                    omnipotent
BLCottCleoCIV.Note: First line has two verse lines in a single manuscript line.
